entry.title: DFIR & SOC - Roadmap (From Zero To Hero)
entry.summary: The 'SOC & DFIR Roadmap' is a structured guide for those pursuing careers in Security Operations Center (SOC) analysis and Digital Forensics and Incident Response (DFIR). It provides a clear learning path from basic cybersecurity and networking concepts to advanced topics like threat management and malware analysis. With a mix of free and paid resources, plus practical exercises, this roadmap helps build essential skills and hands-on experience for success in SOC and DFIR roles.
